sn35.80:1.2: “atthi nu kho, bhante, eko dhammo yassa pahana bhikkhuno avijja pahiyati, vijja uppajjati”ti?
sn35.80:2.1: “Atthi kho, bhikkhu, eko dhammo yassa pahana bhikkhuno avijja pahiyati, vijja uppajjati”ti.
sn35.80:3.1: “Katamo pana, bhante, eko dhammo yassa pahana bhikkhuno avijja pahiyati, vijja uppajjati”ti?
sn35.80:4.1: “Avijja kho, bhikkhu, eko dhammo yassa pahana bhikkhuno avijja pahiyati, vijja uppajjati”ti.
sn35.80:5.1: “Katham pana, bhante, janato, katham passato avijja pahiyati, vijja uppajjati”ti?
sn35.80:6.5: So sabbam dhammam abhijanati, sabbam dhammam abhinnaya sabbam dhammam parijanati, sabbam dhammam parinnaya sabbanimittani annato passati, cakkhum annato passati, rupe …
sn35.80:6.8: yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi annato passati …pe…
sn35.80:6.12: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi annato passati.
sn35.80:6.13: Evam kho, bhikkhu, janato evam passato bhikkhuno avijja pahiyati, vijja uppajjati”ti.
